title: Relationship Between Power and Type II error
text: The power of a test is equal to 1-beta, where beta is the probability of a Type II error.

title: Rewriting the Equation
text: If we have an equation where $$A-B=C$$ and we know the values of A and C, we can rearrange the equation to solve for B: $$B=A-C$$

title: Power Equation Rearrangement
text: After we have rearranged the equation, Type II error $$rate=1-Power$$

title: Solve for Type II Error Rate
text: Plug the values we know into the rearranged equation to solve for the Type II error rate.
